entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
